name: Epic Mayhem
description: Epic Mayhem is an action packed platformer with single and local-multiplayer game with a variety of game modes. Play the campaign solo or Co-op. Play other game modes in teams or free for all competitively with up to 7 friends.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.6Ghz Single Core Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512Mb Graphics Card Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Controllers are Highly recommended
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: 2.6Ghz Dual Core Processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1Gb Graphics Card Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Controllers are Highly recommended
